### Changed
- Upgrade `calico-app` to 0.2.1 to enable Felix metrics.
- Upgrade `cloud-provider-openstack` to version 0.2.2.
- Restrict provider to `openstack`.
- Pass cluster tag to cloud-provider-openstack apps.
